text:
@realDonaldTrump "When you do testing to that extent, you're going to find more people, you're going to find more cases, so I said to my people, 

'SLOW THE TESTING DOWN, PLEASE.'" 

#Malpractice 120,000 Dead of #COVID19 

#coronavirus #Pride
